TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Stylus extends System.Object
public ref class Stylus abstract sealed

summary.span: 可用來存取 Tablet 畫筆的一般資訊。

span.span: Provides access to general information about a tablet pen.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 這個範例假設有呼叫`textBox1`，而且， ，和事件都已連接至事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to event handlers. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]

summary.span: 捕捉繫結至特定項目的手寫筆。

span.span: Captures the stylus that is bound to a particular element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig bool Capture(class System.Windows.IInputElement element) cil managed
Public Shared Function Capture (element As IInputElement) As Boolean

param.name: element
param.span: 要捕捉手寫筆的目的項目。

span.span: The element to capture the stylus to.

summary.span: 將手寫筆捕捉至指定的項目。

span.span: Captures the stylus to the specified element.

returns.span: 如果要捕捉手寫筆至 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the stylus is captured to ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以確保`element`接收手寫筆事件，即使資料指標超出範圍的項目。Use the method to ensure that `element` receives stylus events even when the cursor goes out of the elements' bounds. 若要放開手寫筆時，呼叫與設。To release the stylus, call with the set to . 方法會傳回`false`如果`element`不的顯示和啟用。The method returns `false` if `element` is not visible or enabled. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 這個範例假設有呼叫`textBox1`，而且， ，和事件都已連接至事件處理常式。This example assumes there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to event handlers. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool Capture (System.Windows.IInputElement element, System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode captureMode);
.method public static hidebysig bool Capture(class System.Windows.IInputElement element, valuetype System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode captureMode) cil managed
public: static bool Capture(System::Windows::IInputElement ^ element, System::Windows::Input::CaptureMode captureMode);
static member Capture : System.Windows.IInputElement * System.Windows.Input.CaptureMode -> bool

param.span: 要捕捉手寫筆的目的項目。

param.name: captureMode
param.span: 其中一個 值。

summary.span: 將手寫筆捕捉至指定的項目。

span.span: Captures the stylus to the specified element.

returns.span: 如果要捕捉手寫筆至 ，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the stylus is captured to ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以確保`element`接收手寫筆事件，即使資料指標超出範圍的項目。Use the method to ensure that `element` receives stylus events even when the cursor goes out of the elements' bounds. 若要放開手寫筆時，呼叫與設。To release the stylus, call with the set to . 方法會傳回`false`如果`element`不的顯示和啟用。The method returns `false` if `element` is not visible or enabled. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何將記錄在手寫筆的座標，即使使用者將手寫筆離開。The following example demonstrates how to record the coordinates of the stylus, even if the stylus leaves the bounds of a . 這個範例假設有呼叫`textBox1`，而且， ，和事件都已連接的事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1`, and that the , , and events are connected to the event handlers. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Captured As IInputElement
public: static property System::Windows::IInputElement ^ Captured { System::Windows::IInputElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得手寫筆繫結的項目。

span.span: Gets the element to which the stylus is bound.
The to which the stylus is bound.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何確保使用者碰觸數位板將手寫筆，也不會擷取手寫筆。The following example demonstrates how to ensure that the stylus is not captured when the user touches the stylus to the digitizer. 這個範例假設事件已連結至事件處理常式。This example assumes that the event is connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CurrentStylusDevice As StylusDevice
public: static property System::Windows::Input::StylusDevice ^ CurrentStylusDevice { System::Windows::Input::StylusDevice ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得手寫筆，表示目前使用中的手寫筆。

span.span: Gets the stylus that represents the stylus currently in use.

value.span: 表示目前使用中之手寫筆的 。

span.span: The that represents the stylus currently in use.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何清除反轉的手寫筆已選取的文字。The following example demonstrates how to erase the text that is selected with an inverted stylus. 這個範例假設有呼叫`textBox1`而且事件已連結至事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1` and that the event is connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#8)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property DirectlyOver As IInputElement
public: static property System::Windows::IInputElement ^ DirectlyOver { System::Windows::IInputElement ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得在手寫筆正下方的項目。

span.span: Gets the element that is directly beneath the stylus.
The that is directly beneath the stylus.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何判斷手寫筆位於哪個項目。The following example demonstrates how to determine which element the stylus is positioned over. 這個範例假設有呼叫`textBox1`而且事件已連結至事件處理常式。This example assumes that there is a called `textBox1` and that the event is connected to the event handler. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#3)]

returns.span: 如果指定的項目已啟用筆觸，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Vista 上筆觸，其中一個可能的系統筆勢，會是簡短、 快速的筆觸可對應至巡覽或快速鍵命令。In Windows Vista, a flick, one of the possible system gestures, is a short, quick, straight stroke that can be mapped to a navigation or shortcut command. 根據預設，筆觸停用， ，和。By default, flicks are disabled on the , , and . 在所有其他控制項時啟用筆觸。Flicks are enabled on all other controls. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷上是否啟用筆觸。The following example demonstrates how to determine whether flicks are enabled on a . [!code-csharp[GestureSample#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#6)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#6)]

[!code-csharp[StylusSamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Vista 中，在使用者點選控制項時，就會發生簡短動畫。In Windows Vista, a short animation occurs when the user taps the control. 根據預設，點選回應上已停用。By default, tap feedback is disabled on the . 它會啟用所有其他控制項。It is enabled on all other controls. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何判斷上是否已啟用點選回應。The following example demonstrates how to determine whether tap feedback is enabled on a . [!code-csharp[GestureSample#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Vista 上筆觸，其中一個可能的系統筆勢，會是簡短、 快速的筆觸可對應至巡覽或快速鍵命令。In Windows Vista, a flick, one of the possible system gestures, is a short, quick, straight stroke that can be mapped to a navigation or shortcut command. 根據預設，筆觸停用， ，和。By default, flicks are disabled on the , , and . 在所有其他控制項時啟用筆觸。Flicks are enabled on all other controls. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何停用筆觸。The following example demonstrates how to disable flicks on a . [!code-csharp[GestureSample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按住滑鼠右鍵來的對應。Press and hold maps to the right-click on a mouse. 在 Windows Vista 中，您可以停用此行為項目上的如果您預期的情況下，使用者可能按住 tablet 畫筆而不想要模擬按一下滑鼠右鍵。In Windows Vista, you can disable this behavior on elements if you foresee a situation where the user might hold the tablet pen down without intending to simulate a right-click. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何啟用按住。The following example demonstrates how to enable press and hold on a . 這個範例假設有呼叫`horizontalSlider1`。This example assumes that there is a called `horizontalSlider1`. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#9)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Vista 中，在使用者點選控制項時，就會發生簡短動畫。In Windows Vista, a short animation occurs when the user taps the control. 根據預設，點選回應上已停用。By default, tap feedback is disabled on the . 它會啟用所有其他控制項。It is enabled on all other controls. ## Examples 下列範例上停用點選回應。The following example disables tap feedback on a . MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Synchronize() cil managed

summary.span: 同步處理游標和使用者介面。

span.span: Synchronizes the cursor and the user interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用程式可能需要判斷游標所在的項目。Applications may need to determine the element on which the cursor is located. 如果應用程式使用動畫，方法可能會傳回從資料指標已經移出的項目。If the application uses animation, the method might return an element that has moved out from under the cursor. 呼叫來確定傳回適當的項目。Call to be sure that returns the proper element. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何取得游標下的項目。The following example demonstrates how to get the element that is under the cursor. 呼叫可確保傳回正確的項目。Calling ensures that returns the correct element. [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#24](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#24)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#24](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#24)] [!code-csharp[StylusSamples#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/CSharp/Window2.xaml.cs#25)] [!code-vb[StylusSamples#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusSamples/VisualBasic/Window2.xaml.vb#25)]
